ai-patthana14.5:0.2_0: (The teachings should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana14.5:1.1_0: But by means of the causes and conditions for the sake of causes, both for the sake of cause and reason.
ai-patthana14.5:1.1_1: Then causes and reasons don’t provide the reason for the sake of purification by for the sake of gaining causes and conditions.
ai-patthana14.5:1.1_2: for the sake of purification by way of body, for the sake of principle, neither for the sake of hidden.
ai-patthana14.5:2.1_0: No cause to cause both reason and doesn’t cause the reason for the sake of purification of mind.
ai-patthana14.5:2.1_1: No cause to speak of the people both for the sake of cause and reason for the sake of principle.
ai-patthana14.5:2.1_2: No cause for the sake of demonation and for the sake of causes, neither for the sake of principle nor for the sake of causes.
ai-patthana14.5:3.1_0: Then they don’t cause any reason for the sake of their own cause and condition for the sake of purification by principle, and no cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.5:3.1_1: Then they don’t possess the cause of the reason for the sake of purification by both for the sake of gain and not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.5:3.1_2: for the sake of decorating both causes and conditions for the sake of causes and conditions for the sake of purification, for the sake of heaven, and not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.5:4.1_0: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
